2.1.24.en: Updated app and device icons, improved app description, implemented new authentication process.

2.1.25.en: Fixed a bug that could prevent Homey from receiving data from Toon, enhanced stability, improved app description.

2.2.0.en: Added support for humidity measurements, only available on Toon devices with this feature.
